title: About Me
text:
I am a Master’s student in Mechatronics Engineering at the University of Trento, following the Intelligent Vehicles curriculum.
I have a keen interest in research and development within the mechanical and electronic domains. I am passionate about technology, with a strong attitude toward problem solving, independent work, and team collaboration.
